entry.title: Rich's - Whipped Topping Gold Label - 4 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rich's
Type: BAKING
Price: 25.99

Rich's - Whipped Topping Gold Label - 4 Kg

Liquid topping that was designed to offer greater stability at a higher temperature and at high-speed mixing. Packaged in 4kg carton. 4 cartons per case.

INGREDIENTS

WATER, GLUCOSE-FRUCTOSE, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL (PALM, PALM KERNEL, COCONUT AND/OR COTTONSEED), SUGAR, SODIUM CASEINATE (A MILK DERIVATIVE), MODIFIED CELLULOSE, LACTYLIC ESTERS OF FATTY ACIDS, SODIUM STEAROYL-2-LACTYLATE, DIPOTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, SALT, NATURAL FLAVOUR (CONTAINS MILK INGREDIENTS), MONO AND DIGLYCERIDES, XANTHAN GUM, COLOUR.

CONTAINS: MILK

TIPS & HANDLING

KEEP REFRIGERATED THAW UNDER REFRIGERATION 2-7 C (35°-44°F) FOR 24-48 HOURS BEFORE USE. SHAKE WELL BEFORE OPENING DIRECTIONS FOR USE: POUR INTO CHILLED BOWL (LIQUID DESSERT TOPPING SHOULD NOT EXCEED 20% CAPACITY OF THE BOWL). MIX ON MEDIUM OR HIGH SPEED UNTIL SOFT PEAKS FORM AND GLOSS DISAPPEARS. IDEAL WHIPPING TEMPERATURE FOR PRODUCT IS 7-10 C (45°-50°F). TEMPERATURE WHIPPING SPEED BOWL SIZE AND AMOUNT OF PRODUCT WHIPPED AFFECT WHIPPING TIME. WHIPPING AT COLDER TEMPERATURES RESULTS IN SLIGHTLY LONGER WHIPPING TIME AND A GLOSSY APPEARANCE. WHIPPING AT WARMER TEMPERATURES RESULTS IN A SHORTER WHIPPING TIME AND A DULL APPEARANCE. COLDER AND WARMER WHIPPING TEMPERATURES SLIGHTLY REDUCE YIELD. WHIPPED PRODUCT MUST BE STORED UNDER REFRIGERATION AND CAN BE FROZEN.

entry.title: Caneggs - Egg Powder Spray Dried - 2 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caneggs
Type: BAKING
Price: 29.99

Egg white powder (albumen) made from Canadian farmed pasteurized spray-dried liquid egg whites.

Ingredients:
Egg white, Citric Acid, Baker’s Yeast

Additional Information:
Egg White Powder contains all 9 essential amino acids: histidine, isoleucine, leucine, lysine, methionine, phenylalanine, threonine, tryptophan, and valine.

NOTE:
* Egg White Powder is an allergen. Use standard precaution measures before use.
* Please consult your physician and/or personal trainer for personalized information on your daily requirements.

entry.title: Mccall's - Meringue Powder - 300 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mccall's
Type: BAKING
Price: 12.99

Meringue Powder 300 g

Primarily used to make royal icing and buttercream to add body and stability. It helps royal icing dry quickly without cracking and provides stability for easy pipping. Meringue powder can also be used to replace egg whites in recipes that look for egg whites beaten to stiff peaks, such as angel food cakes, meringue cookies, and other toppings.

To make royal icing:

  • 40 g (5 Level tbsp) Meringue Powder
  • 5 g (1 tsp) Cream of Tartar
  • 190 g warm water
  • 1 kg (7 cups) Icing Sugar
  • Item #: 420
  • Size: 300 g / 10 oz.
  1. Mix meringue powder, cream of tartar, water and hand whisk until foamy.
  2. Add icing sugar.
  3. Using a flat beater, mix at low speed for 10 mins.

entry.title: Mccall's - Whip Cream Stabilizer - 350 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mccall's
Type: BAKING
Price: 11.99

Mccall's - Whip Cream Stabilizer - 350 g

Instant whip cream stabilizer for creams and mousses
freeze thaw stable . Helps to stabilize whipped cream and keeps it from weeping when cakes are refrigerated for several hours before serving. Two tablespoon per 500 grams of whipping cream.

entry.title: Rich's - Vanilla Heat'N Ice Icing - 5.4 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rich's
Type: BAKING
Price: 36.99

Add the finishing touch to your desserts with Rich's Allen vanilla Heat n' Ice donut & roll icing! This icing delivers rich, sweet vanilla flavor with a visually-appealing shine that is sure to enhance the taste and presentation of your offerings. Use it for dipping your donuts and other pastries or for drizzling atop bundt cakes, scones, and sweet rolls to merchandise at your donut shop or in your cafe's bakery case.

This pre-whipped icing is ready to use and does not require you to mix any ingredients prior to use. It is perfect for bulk and last minute orders and reduces the possibility of human error happening when making your own recipe, allowing your staff to devote more time to decorating your baked goods! For best results, place the desired amount of icing in your icing warmer and heat to 100 degrees Fahrenheit. Dip or drizzle onto your baked goods and allow the icing to dry for 2-5 minutes. Cover any unused icing and store at room temperature.

entry.title: Rich's - Chocolate HEAT'N ICE™ Icing - 5.4 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rich's
Type: BAKING
Price: 36.99

Rich's - Chocolate Heat and Ice Icing - 5.4 Kg

Chocolate, flat donut and roll icing used for dipping, drizzling and pouring over product. Recommend heating before use. Packaged in 12-lb pail.

INGREDIENTS

INGREDIENTS FOR CANADIAN MARKET: ICING SUGAR, WATER, GLUCOSE-FRUCTOSE, GLUCOSE SYRUP, MODIFIED PALM OIL, GLUCOSE SYRUP SOLIDS, SOYBEAN OIL, COCOA, ALKALI PROCESSED COCOA, MODIFIED TAPIOCA STARCH, SOYA LECITHIN, CITRIC ACID, PRESERVATIVE (POTASSIUM SORBATE), NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOUR.

CONTAINS: SOYA

TIPS & HANDLING

1. STORE AT ROOM TEMPERATURE. 2. PLACE DESIRED AMOUNT OF HEAT 'N ICE ICING IN ICING WARMER, HEAT TO 110 F (43 C). 3. DIP OR DRIZZLE ICING ON SWEET GOOD, ALLOW TO DRY 2 - 5 MINUTES. 4. TURN OFF ICING WARMER WHEN FINISHED. 5. SCRAPE ICING OFF SIDES OF WARMER. 6. COVER UNUSED ICING.

STORAGE

  • Frozen: 270 DAYS
  • Refrigerated: 270 DAYS
  • Ambient: 270 DAYS
